statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 5 , 2 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x + 4 , 8 \, x^{3} + 8 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x + 10 , 7 \, x^{3} + 10 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x + 11 , -3 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
